titleStmt.title: The true Christians love of the unseen Christ, or, A discourse chiefly tending to excite and promote the decaying love of Christ in the hearts of Christians with an appendix concerning Christs manifestation of himself to them that love him / by Thomas Vincent.
titleStmt.author: Vincent, Thomas, 1634-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.R. for Samuel Sprint,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
